properties.name: server.address
properties.description: Network address to which the server should bind to.

properties.name: server.context-parameters
properties.description: ServletContext parameters.

properties.name: server.context-path
properties.description: Context path of the application.

properties.name: server.display-name
properties.description: Display name of the application.

properties.name: server.port
properties.description: Server HTTP port.

properties.name: server.servlet-path
properties.description: Path of the main dispatcher servlet.

properties.name: server.tomcat.access-log-enabled
properties.description: Enable access log.

properties.name: server.tomcat.access-log-pattern
properties.description: Format pattern for access logs.

properties.name: server.tomcat.background-processor-delay
properties.description: Delay in seconds between the invocation of backgroundProcess methods.

properties.name: server.tomcat.basedir
properties.description: Tomcat base directory. If not specified a temporary directory will be used.

properties.name: server.tomcat.internal-proxies
properties.description: Regular expression that matches proxies that are to be trusted.

properties.name: server.tomcat.max-http-header-size
properties.description: Maximum size in bytes of the HTTP message header.

properties.name: server.tomcat.max-threads
properties.description: Maximum amount of worker threads.

properties.name: server.tomcat.port-header
properties.description: Name of the HTTP header used to override the original port value.

properties.name: server.tomcat.protocol-header
properties.description:
Header that holds the incoming protocol, usually named "X-Forwarded-Proto".
 Configured as a RemoteIpValve only if remoteIpHeader is also set.

properties.name: server.tomcat.protocol-header-https-value
properties.description: Value of the protocol header that indicates that the incoming request uses SSL.

properties.name: server.tomcat.remote-ip-header
properties.description:
Name of the http header from which the remote ip is extracted. Configured as a
 RemoteIpValve only if remoteIpHeader is also set.

properties.name: server.tomcat.uri-encoding
properties.description: Character encoding to use to decode the URI.

properties.name: server.undertow.access-log-dir
properties.description: Undertow access log directory.

properties.name: server.undertow.access-log-enabled
properties.description: Enable access log.

properties.name: server.undertow.access-log-pattern
properties.description: Format pattern for access logs.

properties.name: server.undertow.buffer-size
properties.description: Size of each buffer in bytes.

properties.name: server.undertow.buffers-per-region
properties.description: Number of buffer per region.

properties.name: server.undertow.direct-buffers
properties.description: Allocate buffers outside the Java heap.

properties.name: server.undertow.io-threads
properties.description: Number of I/O threads to create for the worker.

properties.name: server.undertow.worker-threads
properties.description: Number of worker threads.
